document.full_text: libyans armed with guns and a knife stormed a bus carrying foreign journalists on saturday and a soldier fired volleys of gunfire into the air to disperse the crowd, a reuters journalist on the bus said.
document.title: libya crowd attacks bus carrying foreign journalists
lines_and_colors: libyans armed with guns and a knife stormed a bus carrying foreign journalists on saturday and a soldier fired volleys of gunfire into the air to disperse the crowd, a reuters journalist on the bus said.
